name: Da'Lyeh
description:
A short experimental Lovecraftian point and click adventure. 

All graphics in the game (besides the font) have been created by an AI. Specifically DALL-E mini (https://huggingface.co/spaces/dalle-mini/dalle-mini)

I just wanted to make a proof of concept of a creepy game that has been "dreamt up" by a machine. I hope you enjoy the ride! :)

TIPP: Scroll to the top of the screen and click on the backpack to open your inventory!
